Behind the Design

More than the sum of its parts.

Chair X-1 is made up of six birch plywood parts, held together by just one elastic cord.

Red Green Blue. And Yellow.

Its modular design allows Chair X-1 a great deal of colorful customization options.

Download this chair.

You can't buy Chair X-1 (yet), but you can build one yourself. Download the plans for Chair X-1 in the downloads section below.

Downloads

Press Kit (100 MB) / CNC Milling .STL files (20 MB) / 3D Rendering .STL files (20 MB)
